db:abstract.db:para: The Sensor element serves as a base type for sensors.
This type was introduced in QtSensors 5.0.

db:listitem.db:para: Accelerometer, Altimeter, AmbientLightSensor, AmbientTemperatureSensor, Compass, DistanceSensor, Gyroscope, HolsterSensor, IRProximitySensor, LightSensor, Magnetometer, OrientationSensor, PressureSensor, ProximitySensor, RotationSensor, TapSensor, and TiltSensor

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The Sensor element serves as a base type for sensors.
This element wraps the QSensor class. Please see the documentation for QSensor for details.
This element cannot be directly created. Please use one of the sub-classes instead.

db:section.db:title: active : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds a value to indicate if the sensor is active.
Please see QSensor::active for information about this property.

db:section.db:title: alwaysOn : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds a value to indicate if the sensor should remain running when the screen is off.
Please see QSensor::alwaysOn for information about this property.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] availableDataRates : list<Range>
db:section.db:para: This property holds the data rates that the sensor supports.
Please see QSensor::availableDataRates for information about this property.

db:section.db:title: [since QtSensors 5.1] axesOrientationMode : Sensor::AxesOrientationMode
db:section.db:para: This property holds the mode that affects how the screen orientation changes reading values.
Please see QSensor::axesOrientationMode for information about this property.
This property was introduced in QtSensors 5.1.

db:section.db:title: [since QtSensors 5.1] bufferSize : int
db:section.db:para: This property holds the size of the buffer.
Please see QSensor::bufferSize for information about this property.
This property was introduced in QtSensors 5.1.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] busy : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds a value to indicate if the sensor is busy.
Please see QSensor::busy for information about this property.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] connectedToBackend : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds a value indicating if the sensor has connected to a backend.
Please see QSensor::connectedToBackend for information about this property.

db:section.db:title: [read-only, since QtSensors 5.1] currentOrientation : int
db:section.db:para: This property holds the current orientation that is used for rotating the reading values.
Please see QSensor::currentOrientation for information about this property.
This property was introduced in QtSensors 5.1.

db:section.db:title: dataRate : int
db:section.db:para: This property holds the data rate that the sensor should be run at.
Please see QSensor::dataRate for information about this property.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] description : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds a descriptive string for the sensor.

db:section.db:title: [read-only, since QtSensors 5.1] efficientBufferSize : int
db:section.db:para: The property holds the most efficient buffer size.
Please see QSensor::efficientBufferSize for information about this property.
This property was introduced in QtSensors 5.1.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] error : int
db:section.db:para: This property holds the last error code set on the sensor.

db:section.db:title: identifier : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the backend identifier for the sensor.
Please see QSensor::identifier for information about this property.

db:section.db:title: [read-only, since QtSensors 5.1] maxBufferSize : int
db:section.db:para: This property holds the maximum buffer size.
Please see QSensor::maxBufferSize for information about this property.
This property was introduced in QtSensors 5.1.

db:section.db:title: outputRange : int
db:section.db:para: This property holds the output range in use by the sensor.
Please see QSensor::outputRange for information about this property.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] outputRanges : list<OutputRange>
db:section.db:para: This property holds a list of output ranges the sensor supports.
Please see QSensor::outputRanges for information about this property.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] reading : SensorReading
db:section.db:para: This property holds the reading class.
Please see QSensor::reading for information about this property.

db:section.db:title: [since QtSensors 5.1] skipDuplicates : bool
db:section.db:para: This property indicates whether duplicate reading values should be omitted.
Please see QSensor::skipDuplicates for information about this property.
This property was introduced in QtSensors 5.1.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] type : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the type of the sensor.

db:section.db:title: [since QtSensors 5.1] userOrientation : int
db:section.db:para: This property holds the angle used for rotating the reading values in the UserOrientation mode.
Please see QSensor::userOrientation for information about this property.
This property was introduced in QtSensors 5.1.

db:section.db:title: bool start()
db:section.db:para: Start retrieving values from the sensor. Returns true if the sensor was started, false otherwise.
Please see QSensor::start() for information.

db:section.db:title: bool stop()
db:section.db:para: Stop retrieving values from the sensor.
Please see QSensor::stop() for information.
